pull.title: BIP-158: Remove some remaining "extended" mentions
pull.body: The `extended` filter type was removed in https://github.com/bitcoin/bips/pull/687, but some mentions were still present in the document. They can be confusing.

events.body:
See also:

*  BIP 158: remove old reference to extended filter type #787

issue.title: BIP 158: remove old reference to extended filter type

events.body: This can be closed if #787 also takes out the filter type code usage. I wasn't aware of that PR, my apologies.
Can be rebased now that #787 has landed.

BIP-158: Remove some remaining "extended" mentions

issue.title: BIP 158: Fix mediawiki syntax typo, Remove remnants of the second filter type
issue.body:
Fixes #779. This is a render issue in `<ref>` tag (c.f. https://en.bitcoin.it/w/index.php?title=BIP_0158&oldid=66816#Contents, This syntax error causes the rendering on GitHub to fail: https://github.com/bitcoin/bips/blob/b1b248fc6ade930c4c716eb9fed1b48be6796356/bip-0158.mediawiki#GolombCoded_Set_MultiMatch)
Fixes #783 
Fixes #799

events.body: #845 includes this fix (and others), so I think we can merge that instead.

comments.diff_hunk: @@ -323,7 +321,7 @@ This BIP allocates a new service bit: |- | NODE_COMPACT_FILTERS | style="white-space: nowrap;" | 1 << 6 -| If enabled, the node MUST respond to all BIP 157 messages for filter types 0x00 and 0x01 +| If enabled, the node MUST respond to all BIP 157 messages for filter type 0x00
comments.body: If #787 goes in, then we only need this section.
